translations: adj.贫困的；贫穷的（副词 indigently）

phrs.translation: 贫穷的, 贫乏的, 贫困的, 穷困的
贫穷的, 穷困的, 贫乏的

sentences.sentence: Only the most poor or indigent persons fail to receive their last rites.
sentences.translation: 只有一些最贫困的人们才可能无法“享受”他们这最后一次的仪式。

sentences.sentence: In the central reservation, indigent families live under plastic sheeting.
sentences.translation: 而在它的中心聚居地，贫困的家庭在塑料雨棚下生活。

sentences.sentence: The viciousness of the official animus toward the indigent can be breathtaking.
sentences.translation: 官方针对穷人的敌意之恶毒可以说是惊人的。
